panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.time-series-chart","properties":{"height":230,"xField":"time","yFields":["catalina_globalrequestprocessor_bytessent","catalina_globalrequestprocessor_bytesreceived"],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","dims":["time(5m)"],"measures":[{"name":"catalina_globalrequestprocessor_bytessent","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["catalina_globalrequestprocessor_bytessent"]}},{"name":"catalina_globalrequestprocessor_bytesreceived","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["catalina_globalrequestprocessor_bytesreceived"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}]}],"transform":{"data":"@{list}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
